string-array.name: source_info_array
string-array.item: Loss of livelihood (lack of work/income or could not do any work)
Shelter (for example: shelter was Closed down/ Evicted by the house owner/ any other)
Didn’t have access to information for any government help
Unaware about any organization or office where I could possibly approach for immediate help
Not having a cell phone/money to recharge my phone
Could not reach out to the local ward member/corporator/municipal counselor/ Government officials
No/ negligible savings to depend upon for our living
No one was of immediate help to protect my/ our needs of maintaining the daily life (Money, Food, Shelter etc)

string-array.name: when_lcdn_array
string-array.item: Requested support but did not get any

string-array.name: resp_array
string-array.item: Company Supported - gave advance, food, accommodation
Company asked to leave the job and place
Company did not give any support
Company did not take any call

string-array.name: sprt_array
string-array.item: Shared details but no support received
Do not have contact of support agency

string-array.name: assmnt_array
string-array.item: Requested support but did not get any
